Html:
Hi,

I am using php excel for uploading data to excel file. We are not get the html format data to a cell .

For example <b>Test user</b> Name</br>Percentage</br><font  color='red'>Colours</font>

I am getting html tags in the cell.

 

Thanks,

Madhavi

It does not automatically convert HTML to rich text.

Search for "rich text" in the documentation for a gist of how you can write rich text with PHPExcel.
